node.title: Reach the World- Part 1
node.description: The purpose of this seminar is to: 1) Raise awareness that the Mission Fields have come to America Michigan in the form of immigrant and refugee groups. 2) Learn HOW to identify immigrant and refugee groups next door to you and your church. 3) Learn how to use the Reach the World Next Door (RWND) Kit. 4) Be inspired and informed by DVD reports.
